abstract: Philadelphia Phillies send pitcher Ken Giles to Houston Astros as part of seven-player deal that includes acquisition of pitcher Mark Appel; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Phillies completed a seven-player deal sending closer Ken Giles to the Houston Astros, with the former No. 1 overall draft pick Mark Appel heading to Philadelphia.
snippet: The Phillies completed a seven-player deal sending closer Ken Giles to the Houston Astros, with the former No. 1 overall draft pick Mark Appel heading to Philadelphia.
